Surf & Turf Restaurant and Bar ● Weekend Brunch
(941) 844-1352
About The Salty Tarpon
At The Salty Tarpon, we’re proud to make a difference in Punta Gorda by offering a place where the community comes together to enjoy great food, good vibes, and unforgettable experiences. Our relaxed atmosphere, complete with both indoor and outdoor seating, creates the perfect setting for any occasion, whether it’s a casual meal or a lively night out. With a full bar serving up refreshing drinks and live entertainment every evening, there’s always something exciting happening here. From locals to visitors, The Salty Tarpon is more than just a restaurant—it’s a destination where memories are made and the Punta Gorda spirit comes alive.
The Food
The Salty Tarpon serves up a mouthwatering menu that satisfies every craving. Seafood takes center stage, with fresh, flavorful options that highlight the best of the coast. For those who prefer something hearty, their perfectly cooked steaks are sure to impress. The fried platters are a crowd favorite, offering golden, crispy comfort food at its finest. Start your meal with one of their tempting starters, and don’t forget to explore the variety of soups and salads for a lighter but equally satisfying option. The small plates are perfect for sharing or sampling a little bit of everything. At The Salty Tarpon, every bite is packed with flavor and served with a side of warm, welcoming charm.
